titles.title: A concurrent resolution to express the sense of Congress in support of consumer labeling utilizing an American and foreign flag program, labeling all goods and services.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S15220)
Referred to the Committee on Commerce.

bill.summary: 11/5/1993--Introduced. Declares that the Congress supports consumer labeling using an American and foreign flag program for labeling all goods and services.
